info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Convert a table id into a dimension index.
[Parameters] - id : dimension id. - size : size of each dimensions in table (listed from the most inner dimensions to the target dimension).
[Return type] Long-long.
[Examples] Convert id_dim into the related index of the outer dimension of a table with 2 dimensions of 10 and 5 elements each. oph_id_to_index(id_dim,10,5)
